<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- LegalizeVectorOps.cpp - Implement SelectionDAG::LegalizeVectors ----===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the SelectionDAG::LegalizeVectors method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The vector legalizer looks for vector operations which might need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scalarized and legalizes them. This is a separate step from Legalize because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scalarizing can introduce illegal types.  For example, suppose we have an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ISD::SDIV of type v2i64 on x86-32.  The type is legal (for example, addition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on a v2i64 is legal), but ISD::SDIV isn&#39;t legal, so we have to unroll the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation, which introduces nodes with the illegal type i64 which must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expanded.  Similarly, suppose we have an ISD::SRA of type v16i8 on PowerPC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operation must be unrolled, which introduces nodes with the illegal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type i8 which must be promoted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This does not legalize vector manipulations like ISD::BUILD&#95;VECTOR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or operations that happen to take a vector which are custom-lowered;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the legalization for such operations never produces nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with illegal types, so it&#39;s okay to put off legalizing them until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SelectionDAG::Legalize runs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizevectorops-cpp-/vectorlegalizer/#ab3ce50c3e069741fd2cdb0216f66069b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizevectorops-cpp-/vectorlegalizer/#ab3ce50c3e069741fd2cdb0216f66069b">VectorLegalizer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>&amp; dag) :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DAG(dag), TLI(dag.getTargetLoweringInfo()) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Begin legalizer the vector operations in the DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Run();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizevectorops-cpp-/vectorlegalizer/#a45819d3524983de52fd325c7ebf6b801"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizevectorops-cpp-/vectorlegalizer/#a45819d3524983de52fd325c7ebf6b801">VectorLegalizer::Run</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before we start legalizing vector nodes, check if there are any vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasVectors = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#affd0aa316a7d7197e5509b7f85a8f34e">SelectionDAG::allnodes&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DAG.allnodes&#95;begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">       E = std::prev(DAG.allnodes&#95;end()); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != std::next(E); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the values of the nodes contain vectors. We don&#39;t need to check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operands because we are going to check their values at some point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HasVectors = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;values(), &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> T) &#123; return T.isVector(); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found a vector node we can start the legalization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasVectors)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this basic block has no vectors then no need to legalize vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasVectors)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The legalize process is inherently a bottom-up recursive process (users</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// legalize their uses before themselves).  Given infinite stack space, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could just start legalizing on the root and traverse the whole graph.  In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// practice however, this causes us to run out of stack space on large basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks.  To avoid this problem, compute an ordering of the nodes where each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node is only legalized after all of its operands are legalized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DAG.AssignTopologicalOrder();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#affd0aa316a7d7197e5509b7f85a8f34e">SelectionDAG::allnodes&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DAG.allnodes&#95;begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">       E = std::prev(DAG.allnodes&#95;end()); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != std::next(E); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LegalizeOp(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(&amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, it&#39;s possible the root changed.  Get the new root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> OldRoot = DAG.getRoot();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LegalizedNodes.count(OldRoot) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Root didn&#39;t get legalized?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DAG.setRoot(LegalizedNodes&#91;OldRoot&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LegalizedNodes.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove dead nodes now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DAG.RemoveDeadNodes();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Changed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VectorLegalizer::TranslateLegalizeResults(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;Result) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getNumValues() == Result-&gt;getNumValues() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected number of results&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generic legalization: just pass the operand through.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getNumValues(); i != e; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AddLegalizedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getValue(i), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a>(Result, i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(Result, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getResNo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">VectorLegalizer::RecursivelyLegalizeResults(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;SDValue&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.size() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getNumValues() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected number of results&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that the generated code is itself legal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.size(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#91;i&#93; = LegalizeOp(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AddLegalizedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getValue(i), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getResNo()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are currently two cases of vector promotion:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Bitcasting a vector of integers to a different type to a vector of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    same overall length. For example, x86 promotes ISD::AND v2i32 to v1i64.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Extending a vector of floats to a vector of the same number of larger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    floats. For example, AArch64 promotes ISD::FADD on v4f16 to v4f32.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can&#39;t promote a vector with multiple results!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Build a base mask of undef shuffles.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndianOffset = DAG.getDataLayout().isBigEndian() ? ExtLaneScale - 1 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumElements; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask&#91;i &#42; ExtLaneScale + EndianOffset&#93; = i;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First build an any-extend node which can be legalized above when we</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aaa275bf149ab5df1067cfb721936ecbc">ISD::ANY&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT, Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we need sign extend. Do this by shifting the elements. Even if these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aren&#39;t legal operations, they have a better chance of being legalized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without full scalarization than the sign extension does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltWidth = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcEltWidth = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> ShiftAmount = DAG.getConstant(EltWidth - SrcEltWidth, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generically expand a vector zext in register to a shuffle of the relevant</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and a bitcast to the wider element type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VectorLegalizer::ExpandZERO&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElements = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SrcVT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>.getValueType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcElements = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG SrcVT can be smaller than VT - so insert the vector</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae67a729c436915221367d8e77412dff4">bitsLE</a>(VT)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumSrcElements = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() / SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a1617abaedbb1d902bb3a5b3136684f9c">ISD::INSERT&#95;SUBVECTOR</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SrcVT, DAG.getUNDEF(SrcVT),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      Src, DAG.getVectorIdxConstant(0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Build up a zero vector to blend into this one.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shuffle the incoming lanes into the correct position, and pull all other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lanes from the zero vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShuffleMask = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a886094eaed7ce32029ea52a641142b88">llvm::to&#95;vector&lt;16&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adc4eb8be6f7a12ede962987fb9cabb47">llvm::seq&lt;int&gt;</a>(0, NumSrcElements));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExtLaneScale = NumSrcElements / NumElements;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndianOffset = DAG.getDataLayout().isBigEndian() ? ExtLaneScale - 1 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumElements; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask&#91;i &#42; ExtLaneScale + EndianOffset&#93; = NumSrcElements + i;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439" lineLink="#ad378536508f0c71b730daf4da2026076"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ad378536508f0c71b730daf4da2026076">createBSWAPShuffleMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarSizeInBytes = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = ScalarSizeInBytes - 1; J &gt;= 0; --J)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; ScalarSizeInBytes) + J);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VectorLegalizer::ExpandBSWAP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scalable vectors can&#39;t use shuffle expansion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ab8967b7214f38cdea9c0158dbe2ffa31">isScalableVector</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TLI.expandBSWAP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>, DAG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate a byte wise shuffle mask for the BSWAP.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VectorLegalizer::ExpandVSELECT(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implement VSELECT in terms of XOR, AND, OR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on platforms which do not support blend natively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Op2 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>.getValueType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can&#39;t even use the basic vector operations of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AND,OR,XOR, we will have to scalarize the op.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Notice that the operation may be &#39;promoted&#39; which means that it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;bitcasted&#39; to another type which is handled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TLI.getOperationAction(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>, VT) == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a12b8712b6c436a8152a5fa996cd8956aa4b85349547c5b6126817e10152007931">TargetLowering::Expand</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TLI.getOperationAction(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a92febb83e6ba116eb7aae8e7e3f70cc1">ISD::XOR</a>, VT) == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a12b8712b6c436a8152a5fa996cd8956aa4b85349547c5b6126817e10152007931">TargetLowering::Expand</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TLI.getOperationAction(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a7415ab9f2172c59a2ee7c7a02afa56a4">ISD::OR</a>, VT) == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a12b8712b6c436a8152a5fa996cd8956aa4b85349547c5b6126817e10152007931">TargetLowering::Expand</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This operation also isn&#39;t safe with AND, OR, XOR when the boolean type is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to expand libm nodes into vector math routine calls. Callers provide the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LibFunc equivalent of the passed in Node, which is used to lookup mappings</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within TargetLibraryInfo. The only mappings considered are those where the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result and all operands are the same vector type. While predicated nodes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not supported, we will emit calls to masked routines by passing in an all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true mask.</span></CodeLine>
